meanings.definition: Relating to or situated near the ambulacra of echinoderms.
meanings.sent1: The ambulacral region of the sea star helps in movement.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the ambulacral structures of the sea urchin.
meanings.sent3: The ambulacral pathways of the starfish were like tiny highways.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers moved with the precision of ambulacral tube feet.
meanings.sent5: The ambulacral markings on the sand dollar were intricate and beautiful.
